verses.verse: These <WH428> are the journeys <WH4550> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> by which <WH834> they came <WH3318> out from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by their armies, <WH6635> under the leadership <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>

And Moses <WH4872> recorded <WH3789> their starting <WH4161> places <WH4161> according to their journeys <WH4550> by the command <WH6310> of the Lord, <WH3068> and these <WH428> are their journeys <WH4550> according to their starting <WH4161> places. <WH4161>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month; <WH2320> on the next <WH4283> day <WH4283> after <WH4480> the Passover <WH6453> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> started <WH3318> out boldly <WH7311> <WH3027> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> the Egyptians, <WH4714>

while the Egyptians <WH4714> were burying <WH6912> all <WH3605> their first-born whom <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> among them. The Lord <WH3068> had also executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> on their gods. <WH430>
Then the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses, <WH7486> and camped <WH2583> in Succoth. <WH5523>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Succoth, <WH5523> and camped <WH2583> in Etham, <WH864> which <WH834> is on the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness. <WH4057>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Etham, <WH864> and turned <WH7725> back <WH7725> to Pi-hahiroth, which <WH834> faces <WH5921> <WH6440> Baal-zephon; and they camped <WH2583> before <WH6440> Migdol. <WH4024>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from before <WH6440> Hahiroth, <WH6367> and passed <WH5674> through the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> into the wilderness; <WH4057> and they went <WH1980> three <WH7969> days' journey <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Etham, <WH864> and camped <WH2583> at Marah. <WH4785>

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Marah, <WH4785> and came <WH935> to Elim; <WH362> and in Elim <WH362> there were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> springs <WH9407> of water <WH4325> and seventy <WH7657> palm <WH8558> trees; <WH8558> and they camped <WH2583> there. <WH8033>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Elim, <WH362> and camped <WH2583> by the Red <WH5488> <WH3220> Sea. <WH3220>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the Red <WH5488> <WH3220> Sea, <WH3220> and camped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin. <WH9358>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin, <WH9358> and camped <WH2583> at Dophkah. <WH1850>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Dophkah, <WH1850> and camped <WH2583> at Alush. <WH442>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Alush, <WH442> and camped <WH2583> at Rephidim; <WH7508> now it was there <WH8033> that the people <WH5971> had <WH1961> no <WH3808> water <WH4325> to drink. <WH8354>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rephidim, <WH7508> and camped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> and camped <WH2583> at Kibroth-hattaavah.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kibroth-hattaavah, and camped <WH2583> at Hazeroth. <WH2698>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hazeroth, <WH2698> and camped <WH2583> at Rithmah. <WH7575>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rithmah, <WH7575> and camped <WH2583> at Rimmon-perez.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rimmon-perez, and camped <WH2583> at Libnah. <WH3841>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Libnah, <WH3841> and camped <WH2583> at Rissah. <WH7446>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rissah, <WH7446> and camped <WH2583> in Kehelathah. <WH6954>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kehelathah, <WH6954> and camped <WH2583> at Mount <WH2022> Shepher. <WH8234>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Mount <WH2022> Shepher, <WH8234> and camped <WH2583> at Haradah. <WH2732>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Haradah, <WH2732> and camped <WH2583> at Makheloth. <WH4722>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Makheloth, <WH4722> and camped <WH2583> at Tahath. <WH8480>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Tahath, <WH8480> and camped <WH2583> at Terah. <WH8646>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Terah, <WH8646> and camped <WH2583> at Mithkah. <WH4989>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Mithkah, <WH4989> and camped <WH2583> at Hashmonah. <WH2832>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hashmonah, <WH2832> and camped <WH2583> at Moseroth. <WH4149>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Moseroth, <WH4149> and camped <WH2583> at Bene-jaakan.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Bene-jaakan, and camped <WH2583> at Hor-haggidgad.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hor-haggidgad, and camped <WH2583> at Jotbathah. <WH3193>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Jotbathah, <WH3193> and camped <WH2583> at Abronah. <WH5684>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Abronah, <WH5684> and camped <WH2583> at Ezion-geber.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Ezion-geber, and camped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin, <WH6790> that is, Kadesh. <WH6946>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kadesh, <WH6946> and camped <WH2583> at Mount <WH2022> Hor, <WH2023> at the edge <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Edom. <WH9000>

Then Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> went <WH5927> up to Mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> at the command <WH6310> of the Lord, <WH3068> and died <WH4191> there, <WH8033> in the fortieth <WH705> year <WH8141> after the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had come <WH3318> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> on the first <WH259> [day] in the fifth <WH2549> month. <WH2320>
And Aaron <WH175> was one hundred <WH3967> twenty-three years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died <WH4194> on Mount <WH2022> Hor. <WH2023>

Now the Canaanite, <WH3669> the king <WH4428> of Arad <WH6166> who <WH1931> lived <WH3427> in the Negev <WH5045> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> heard <WH8085> of the coming <WH935> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
Then they journeyed <WH5265> from Mount <WH2022> Hor, <WH2023> and camped <WH2583> at Zalmonah. <WH6758>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Zalmonah, <WH6758> and camped <WH2583> at Punon. <WH6325>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Punon, <WH6325> and camped <WH2583> at Oboth. <WH88>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Oboth, <WH88> and camped <WH2583> at Iye-abarim, at the border <WH1366> of Moab. <WH4124>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Iyim, <WH5864> and camped <WH2583> at Dibon-gad.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Dibon-gad, and camped <WH2583> at Almon-diblathaim.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Almon-diblathaim, and camped <WH2583> in the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim, <WH5682> before <WH6440> Nebo. <WH5015>
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim, <WH5682> and camped <WH2583> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> [opposite] Jericho. <WH3405>
And they camped <WH2583> by the Jordan, <WH3383> from Beth-jeshimoth as far <WH5704> as Abel-shittim in the plains <WH6160> of Moab. <WH4124>
Then the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> [opposite] Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559>
"Speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, 'When <WH3588> you cross <WH5674> over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667>

then you shall drive <WH3423> out all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you, and destroy all <WH6> their figured <WH3605> stones, <WH4906> and destroy all <WH4906> their molten <WH6> images <WH3605> and demolish <WH4541> all <WH4541> their high <WH8045> places; <WH3605>
and you shall take <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of the land <WH776> and live <WH3427> in it, for I have given <WH5414> the land <WH776> to you to possess <WH3423> it.

'And you shall inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> by lot <WH1486> according to your families; <WH4940> to the larger <WH7227> you shall give <WH7235> more <WH7235> inheritance, <WH5159> and to the smaller <WH4592> you shall give <WH4591> less <WH4591> inheritance. <WH5159> Wherever <WH413> <WH834> <WH8033> the lot <WH1486> falls <WH3318> to anyone, that shall be his. You shall inherit <WH5157> according to the tribes <WH4294> of your fathers.

'But if <WH518> you do not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you, then it shall come <WH1961> about that those whom <WH834> you let <WH3498> remain <WH3498> of them [will become] as pricks <WH7899> in your eyes <WH5869> and as thorns <WH6796> in your sides, <WH6654> and they shall trouble <WH6887> you in the land <WH776> in which <WH834> you live. <WH3427>
'And it shall come <WH1961> about that as I plan <WH1819> to do <WH6213> to them, so I will do <WH6213> to you.' "
